TabulaRasa.UpdateDef.content:
Version 1.1.8240 - Removed: Clay Brick firing recipe on the Forge, this was for testing and meant to be removed before they were even added. - Fixed: Duplicate XML node on a couple of the turrets, unsure why the game never alerted me to this.
For More information please see the Outpost 21 Wiki, left-click to open the page, right click to dismiss update.
